description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget called AccentChip, which is a styled chip component used for UI purposes. It extends StatelessWidget and primarily provides a small accentuated chip with a label, utilizing theme-based coloring and specific styling attributes.

classes.name: AccentChip
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing a small styled chip with a label, using theme secondary color for background.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the AccentChip, returning a styled Chip widget with configured label and appearance.
